name: The Wonderland
description: The tour app story will be about the users who downloaded this app which the app makes him/her suddenly remembers his/her past memories and found out that he/she is living in a virtual reality world and is due to the AI has taken over our real human world and lock all human in a virtual world. And this app is an app that is built in the future and is asking the user to complete the missions in the app which would allow the user to escape back to the real world and save humans from AI. This story allows the user to be more engaging as the app is giving a purpose for the users to complete these missions, or the users may actually think the story of this app is real.
